thread.title: Android Nougat update rolling out for OnePlus 3 and 3T
thread.title_full: Android Nougat update rolling out for OnePlus 3 and 3T

title: Android Nougat update rolling out for OnePlus 3 and 3T
text:
Android Nougat update rolling out for OnePlus 3 and 3T Android Nougat update rolling out for OnePlus 3 and 3T By January 2, 2017 “The update comes with support for multi-window and custom DPI’s” 
OnePlus is starting out strong in 2017 by updating its flagships to Android Nougat. The Chinese smartphone maker has confirmed the Android Nougat rollout for the OnePlus 3 and the OnePlus 3T. Users of both the OnePlus 3 ( review ) and the OnePlus 3T ( review ) will soon be able to taste Google’s latest delicacy on their smartphones. The rollout for the update will be incremental and will be based on OxygenOS 4.0 for both the smartphones.Here’s the changelog for the update: New Notification Design
